I you want free games and a jailbkreaked PS3, then you wont be able to play online, well not yet anyway.
When you get your PS3, you have to download and put firmware 3.41 onto your PS3, but if you you update and put 3.42 on it, then you can NOT jailbreak you PS3.

And this game is American.
